data.title: Alfonso XII of Spain
data.text:
December 29, 1874 - November 25, 1885 (10 years) (17-27) Preceded by Amadeo I of Spain Mother Luisa Carlotta, Princess of the Two Sicilies (1804-44) Mother Maria Christina, Princess of the Two Sicilies (1806-78) Death April 9, 1904 (73 years) 7. Maria de la Concepción, Infanta of Spain

(1859-61) (2 years)

N/A N/A 9. María de la Paz, Infanta of Spain

(1862-1946) (84 years)

Ludwig Ferdinand, Prince of Bavaria

(1859-1949, m.1883)

2 sons, 1 daughter Father Francis I, King of the Two Sicilies (1777-1830) Father Francis I, King of the Two Sicilies (1777-1830) Marriage February 14, 1901 - October 17, 1904 (3 years, died) Marriage January 12, 1906 - September 23, 1912 (6 years, died) 2. José Eugenio, Prince of Bavaria

(1909-66) (57 years)

María de la Asunción Solange de Mesía y de Lesseps, Countess of Odiel

(1911-2005, m.1933)

2 sons, 2 daughters
